select INBOX_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into inbox (NO,MSG_NO,OFFICIAL_NO) values(#{no},#{msgNo},#{officialNo})

select OUTBOX_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into outbox (MSG_NO,OFFICIAL_NO,OFFICIAL_NAME,CONTENTS) values(#{msgNo},#{officialNo},#{officialName},#{contents})
mapper.select: select count(*) from inbox where official_no = #{officialNo} and read_date is null

select count(*) from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where o.official_no != i.official_no and i.keep_flag = 'N' and i.official_no=#{officialNo}
and ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

select count(*) from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where o.official_no != i.official_no and i.keep_flag = 'N' and o.official_no=#{officialNo} and del_flag = 'N'
and ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

select count(*) from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where o.official_no != i.official_no and i.keep_flag = 'Y' and i.official_no=#{officialNo}
and ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

select count(*) from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where o.official_no = i.official_no and i.keep_flag = 'N' and i.official_no=#{officialNo}
and ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

select count(*) from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where i.official_no=#{officialNo} or o.official_no=#{officialNo}
and ${searchCondition} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
select o.*, i.official_no in_Offi, i.no, i.read_date from outbox o join inbox i on o.msg_no = i.msg_no where no = #{no}
